column4: I've suddenly run into problems burning cds in hoary.  I burned one cd successfully, and now ubuntu doesn't seem to recognize when i put in a new blank cd.  can someone help?
i tried using gnomebaker but the same thing happens.  It says 'please insert a blank cd' and then hangs until it crashes
that may be a problem with your burner
i just successfully burned a cd a few seconds ago though.
